question: is Durham University part of the Russell Group

transcript.prompt: Answer YES or NO: is Durham University part of the Russell Group

transcript.reply: Durham University is not part of the Russell Group. The Russell Group is a self-selected association of 24 public research universities in the United Kingdom, which are considered to be the leading research-intensive universities. Durham University, while a prestigious institution, is not a member of this group. It is, however, a member of the Worldwide Universities Network (WUN), which is a global network of 24 leading research
